name: Conscience
description: Moral judgment and ability to evaluate right from wrong.

name: Self-Control
description: Discipline and mastery over one's emotions and impulses.

name: Courage
description: Gumption and ability to withstand fear and danger.

name: Conviction
description: Ability to maintain reason and reconcile predatory urges with capacity for atrocity.

name: Instinct
description: Ability to control the Beast by familiarity, harnessing destructive power.
